paragraphs: Faendal and Sven are competing for the affection of Camilla Valerius. The player can help either of them, delivering fake letters which makes the other look bad. The player can also tell Camilla about the rivalry and marry her himself.

I yearn to have you as my own, 
Washing my linens, 
And my fine blond hair,
To cook my dinner from my stove, 
And tend to my house while I wander.
